name: Silly Sam
description:
A game by BERD

Description

Help Sam on a little stroll through life as he struggles to stay on his feet.

Inspired by QWOP and Octodad.

Source available on GitHub: https://github.com/davidjtferguson/silly-sam

 

Programming - Davbo

Art - Rory & Ben

Audio Design - Ed

controls

For both sets of controls you use your left hand for Sam’s left side and right hand for Sam’s right side.

If you fall over push up on your arms to get up.

XBox controls

Use the Triggers to kick off the ground.

Hold the Bumpers to grab onto stuff.

Use the Sticks to guide Sam’s arms.

Press Start to pause.

Press Back or Right on the d-pad to toggle fullscreen.

Press Down on the d-pad to toggle music.

Keyboard controls

Use C and N to kick off the ground.

E grabs with left hand, U grabs with right hand.

Use WASD to direct the left arm and IJKL to direct the right arm.

Press P or Esc to pause.

Use F to toggle fullscreen.

Use M to toggle music.
